get_obs_data module¶

Get Observation Data

This script allows the user to get the specified observation data from Dataex server. This tool downloads the desired observation data in json format.

Usage:

get_obs_data.py –start_date = [YYYY-MM-DD] ..

–end_date = [YYYY-MM-DD] .. –stn_id = [Id of station] .. –p_id = [Id of parameter] .. –out = [output filename] ..

dataex-client
